summary: This is a brief email exchange between Geoffrey Berman and an unnamed recipient regarding the need for a summary of forfeiture options related to Jeffrey Epstein by the morning of Thursday, August 15, 2019. It indicates active legal planning in the Epstein case shortly after his arrest.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: The sender/recipient of the email, requesting a summary of forfeiture options regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Deadline for forfeiture options summary
events.description: Geoffrey Berman requests a summary of forfeiture options regarding Jeffrey Epstein to be ready by Thursday morning.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 14, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019.
Geoffrey Berman, then US Attorney for the Southern District of New York, was actively seeking legal strategies regarding asset forfeiture in the Epstein case.
The communication indicates the US Attorney's Office was preparing for potential forfeiture proceedings against Epstein's assets.
